15-20% *

of their weight on average per year is what people typically lose when participating in weight loss programs supervised by Slim Clinic doctors.

*In clinical trials, Ozempic and Mounjaro patients with a weight-related condition and with BMI ≥30, or BMI ≥27 lost 15% and 20% of their weight on average, when paired with diet and exercise changes (compared to 2.4% and 3.1%, with diet and exercise alone).

How we work
Step
Call Our Office

Fill out a brief medical history form to help your provider tailor the most effective treatment plan for you. It's quick, simple, and complimentary.

Contact us
Step
Meet the doctor

Have a chat with a licensed physician or nurse practitioner about your condition through a convenient online consultation.

Meet our experts
Step
Get your medication

Get your medication delivered to your doorstep with free shipping included in all programs. Reach out to your provider whenever you require assistance.

It's not a miracle, it's metabolic science.

Traditional dieting frequently proves ineffective, with genetics influencing approximately 70% of an individual's weight. Medications provide a fresh approach, harmonizing with your body's processes to promote sustainable and healthy weight loss results.

Your physician will create a custom medication therapy that will include a combination of FDA approved medications as well as compounded medications that do not go through the FDA approval process but rather are compounded in an FDA inspected facility. Anti-aging medicine includes the applications of different medications that are used both on and off label as well. Your physician will work with you to create an optimal program that meets all of your needs with every possible prescription resource available.
